Ledu/mit/icc_intent_class_modeling/MainA: The `onCreate` method first invokes the superclass constructor. Then, it calls `setContentView` with an integer constant (2130903040). Next, it attempts to get a `TelephonyManager` using `getSystemService` with the string "phone". Finally, it calls `getDeviceId()` on the `TelephonyManager` and logs the result using `Log.i`. The `getDeviceId()` call is the sink. The register `v1` holds the device ID from `getDeviceId()`.  This register is then passed to the sink `Log.i`.
